forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly sunny. High near 92, with temperatures falling to around 90 in the afternoon. South wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Partly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before midnight. Partly cloudy. Low around 68, with temperatures rising to around 70 overnight. North northwest wind 2 to 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Sunny then Isolated Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: Isolated showers and thunderstorms after 2pm. Mostly sunny. High near 91, with temperatures falling to around 88 in the afternoon. Northeast wind 3 to 7 mph. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tuesday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Isolated Showers And Thunderstorms then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: Isolated showers and thunderstorms before 8pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 8pm and 2am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly cloudy, with a low around 67. North northeast wind 2 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 82. Northwest wind around 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Areas of smoke between 10pm and 2am, then areas of smoke and isolated rain showers. Mostly clear, with a low around 61. North wind 0 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Areas of smoke and scattered rain showers. Partly sunny, with a high near 78. Northeast wind 0 to 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

forecast.name: Tuesday Night

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
